medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Developed periumbilical pain 3 days ago, now migrating to the right lower quadrant. The pain is constant, dull ache that is worse with movement.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Type 2 diabetes mellitus, Factor V Leiden with recurrent DVTs (on Coumadin), history of morbid obesity, hypothyroidism, peripheral vascular disease with phlebitis, obstructive sleep apnea (moderate to severe, not requiring CPAP), migraines, diverticulosis, depression.
medical_history.family_history: Grandmother died of PE, father had CAD, grandparents had lung and skin cancer.
